TEXT.English: Holkan
TEXT.Chinese: 玛雅战士

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ballista[COLOR_REVERT], the Roman replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT], has two additional strength points and doesn't have a bonus when attacking cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弩炮[COLOR_REVERT]，罗马取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弹射器[COLOR_REVERT]，有两个额外的力量点，攻击城市时没有加成。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Scouts[COLOR_REVERT] are able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT], gain only positive bonuses from Tribal villages, can only defend and have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Animal Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]侦察兵[COLOR_REVERT]以探索未知地域；探访[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]部落村庄[COLOR_REVERT]时能获得更好的收获。但是他们不能用于攻击。

TEXT.English: Djong
TEXT.Chinese: 印尼战船

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Protestant Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT]) can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Protestantism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]新教传教士[COLOR_REVERT]）可以在友好城市（或与您有[COLOR_REVERT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]的竞争城市）传播[COLOR_REVERT]新教[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grenzer[COLOR_REVERT], the Holy Roman replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grenadier[COLOR_REVERT], requires [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Geography[COLOR_REVERT] instead of [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Chemistry[COLOR_REVERT], and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerilla I[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Disengage I[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]神罗边防军[COLOR_REVERT]，神圣罗马取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]掷弹机[COLOR_REVERT]，需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]地理[COLOR_REVERT]，而不是[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]化学[COLOR_REVERT]，从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]游击队I[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]脱离I[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Galleys[COLOR_REVERT] cannot enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ocean[COLOR_REVERT], cannot pass [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Capes[COLOR_REVERT] until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Compass[COLOR_REVERT] and can withdraw from combat.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战舰[COLOR_REVERT]无法进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]海洋[COLOR_REVERT]，无法通过[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]斗篷[COLOR_REVERT]直到[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]指南针[COLOR_REVERT]并可以退出战斗。

TEXT.English: Huszar
TEXT.Chinese: 匈牙利骑兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT] are invisible to all units to all units except [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT], have two first strikes and can see [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nuclear Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Destroyer[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]隐形驱逐舰[COLOR_REVERT]不会被任何其他单位发现，是一种强大的现代海军舰船，只有用另外一艘[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]隐形驱逐舰[COLOR_REVERT]才能对付它。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cogs[COLOR_REVERT] have two cargo spaces, cannot enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ocean[COLOR_REVERT], cannot pass [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Capes[COLOR_REVERT] until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Compass[COLOR_REVERT] and can withdraw from combat.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]运输船[COLOR_REVERT]有两个货位，不能进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]海洋[COLOR_REVERT]，不能通过[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]岬角[COLOR_REVERT]，直到[COLOR U TECH U TEXT]指南针[COLOR_REVERT]才能退出战斗。

TEXT.English: Cho-Ko-Nu
TEXT.Chinese: 诸葛弩

TEXT.English: Samurai
TEXT.Chinese: 日本武士

TEXT.English: Gendarme
TEXT.Chinese: 法国近卫骑兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Torpedo Boats[COLOR_REVERT] cannot enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ocean[COLOR_REVERT], have a first strike, can withdraw from combat and have a combat bonus attacking on [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coast[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]鱼雷艇[COLOR_REVERT]不能进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]海洋[COLOR_REVERT]，有第一次攻击，可以退出战斗，并且在[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]海岸[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗加成攻击。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Corsair[COLOR_REVERT], the Moorish replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateer[COLOR_REVERT], has one less movement point, has two less strength points, is cheaper, has a combat bonus on [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coast[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateer[COLOR_REVERT] unit and provides some gold when sinking enemy ships.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]海盗船[COLOR_REVERT]，摩尔人取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]海盗船[COLOR_REVERT]，减少一个移动点，减少两个力量点，更便宜，在[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]海岸[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗加成，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]海盗船[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗加成，并提供一些击沉敌舰时的黄金。

TEXT.English: Skirmisher
TEXT.Chinese: 标枪兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bears[COLOR_REVERT] are Barbarian units that spawn in Siberia from 3000 to 850 BC.
TEXT.Chinese: 熊是公元前3000年至850年在西伯利亚产卵的野蛮单位。

TEXT.English: Albion Legion
TEXT.Chinese: 阿尔比恩掷弹兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariots[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, can withdraw from combat and have a combat bonus on open terrain.
TEXT.Chinese: 当你关注行军的速度时，可以训练这种最原始的骑乘单位，但记住使他们一直保持进攻，因为它们无法获得防御加成。

TEXT.English: Chang Suek
TEXT.Chinese: 暹罗战象

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombards[COLOR_REVERT] cannot capture enemy cities or units, don't receive defensive bonuses, have a combat bonus when attacking cities, cause collateral damage, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and can bombard city defenses.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轰炸机[COLOR_REVERT]不能占领敌人的城市或单位，不能获得防御加成，攻击城市时有战斗加成，造成附带伤害，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]攻城武器的附带伤害免疫，并且可以轰炸城市防御。

TEXT.English: ICBM
TEXT.Chinese: 洲际弹道导弹

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Winged Hussar[COLOR_REVERT], the Polish replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cuirassier[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arquebusier[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketeer[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR U UNIT TEXT]翼轻骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR U UNIT TEXT]护甲师[COLOR_REVERT]的波兰替代品，对[COLOR U UNIT TEXT]Arquebusier[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR UNIT TET TEXT]火枪手[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗加成。

TEXT.English: Drone
TEXT.Chinese: 无人机

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dharani[COLOR_REVERT], the Tamil replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cog[COLOR_REVERT], has two extra strength points, two extra movement points and two first strikes.
TEXT.Chinese: 泰米尔人取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轮齿[COLOR_REVERT]的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轮齿[COLOR_REVERT]有两个额外的力量点，两个额外的移动点和两个第一击。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Artists[COLOR_REVERT] can begin golden ages, discover new technologies, settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Artist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, can construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Museum[COLOR_REVERT] building, and can create a great work which generates 800 culture per game era.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大艺术家[COLOR_REVERT]能创作[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]艺术杰作[COLOR_REVERT]为所在城市大量积累文化。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Elephant[COLOR_REVERT], the Mughal replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT] resource, has one additional strength point and has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archery Units[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunpowder Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]攻城大象[COLOR_REVERT]，莫卧儿人代替[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轰炸[COLOR_REVERT]，需要[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]象牙[COLOR_REVERT]资源，有一个额外的力量点，并且对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]射箭单位[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火药单位[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗加成。

TEXT.English: Shotelai
TEXT.Chinese: 埃塞尔比亚剑士

TEXT.English: Strelets
TEXT.Chinese: 俄国卫兵

TEXT.English: Fusilier
TEXT.Chinese: 普鲁士燧发枪兵

TEXT.English: Taoist Daoshi
TEXT.Chinese: 道士

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Huscarl[COLOR_REVERT], the Viking replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Amphibious[COLOR_REVERT] and has an additional attack bonus when attacking cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]赫斯卡尔[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]，海盗取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重剑手[COLOR_REVERT]，以[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]两栖[COLOR_REVERT]开始，攻击城市时有额外的攻击加成。

TEXT.English: Grenadier Cavalry
TEXT.Chinese: 掷弹骑兵

TEXT.English: War Chariot
TEXT.Chinese: 埃及战车

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grenadiers[COLOR_REVERT] have one first strike, can withdraw from combat, cause collateral damage, have an attack bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT] and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]City Raider I[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 训练这种中等战力的火器部队可以有效地对抗拥有大量[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]来复枪兵[COLOR_REVERT]的部队。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Yan Lifida[COLOR_REVERT], the Nigerian replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancer[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resource, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and receives a defensive bonus.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]尼日利亚骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]是尼日利亚替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]的，不需要[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]资源，可以进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丛林[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]雨林[COLOR_REVERT]并获得防御加成

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Panthers[COLOR_REVERT] are Barbarian units that spawn in Africa from 3000 to 850 BC.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]黑豹[COLOR_REVERT]是公元前3000年至850年在非洲繁殖的野蛮单位。

TEXT.English: Great Bombard
TEXT.Chinese: 土耳其火炮

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Qizilbash[COLOR_REVERT], the Iranian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arquebusier[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against other [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunpowder Units[COLOR_REVERT] and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerilla I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: 伊朗的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] 齐齐尔巴什 [COLOR_REVERT]，是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] 火绳枪兵 [COLOR_REVERT]的伊朗人替代品。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ghazi[COLOR_REVERT], the Arabian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], has one additional movement point and has an additional attack bonus when attacking cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]阿拉伯重剑士[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重剑手[COLOR_REVERT]的阿拉伯替代品，在攻击城市时有一个额外的移动点和额外的攻击加成。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Camel Gunners[COLOR_REVERT] are immune to first strikes, don't receive defensive bonuses, can withdraw from combat, have a combat bonus on open terrain and have a flank attack against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trebuchet[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT] units, have a bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry Units[COLOR_REVERT] units, have a combat bonus in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Desert[COLOR_REVERT] and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Desert Adaptation[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骆驼炮手[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]对第一次攻击免疫，不接受防御加成，可以退出战斗，在开阔地形上有战斗加成，并且对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弹射器[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]投石机[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轰炸[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]加农炮[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]单位，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重骑兵单位有加成，在[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]沙漠[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]有战斗加成，从[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]沙漠适应[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]升级开始。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Balestriere[COLOR_REVERT], the Italian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Crossbowman[COLOR_REVERT], has an additional first strike and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Amphibious[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]意大利弩手[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弩手[COLOR_REVERT]的意大利替代品，它有一个额外的第一次攻击，并以[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]两栖[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Royal Mamluk[COLOR_REVERT], the Mamluk replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancer[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Light Cavarly Units[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry Units[COLOR_REVERT] and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Desert Adaptation[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: 皇家马穆鲁克[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]皇家马穆鲁克[COLOR_REVERT]，马穆鲁克替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轻型骑兵单位[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重型骑兵单位[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗加成，并以[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]沙漠适应[COLOR_REVERT]开始。

TEXT.English: Cruiser
TEXT.Chinese: 巡洋舰

TEXT.English: Mohawk
TEXT.Chinese: 北美火枪手

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleasses[COLOR_REVERT] cannot enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ocean[COLOR_REVERT], cannot pass [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Capes[COLOR_REVERT] until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Compass[COLOR_REVERT] and have a combat bonus on [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coast[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]帆船[COLOR_REVERT]不能进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]海洋[COLOR_REVERT]，不能通过[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Capes[COLOR_REVERT]直到[COLOR U TECH U TEXT]指南针[COLOR_REVERT]并且在[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]海岸[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Oromo Warrior[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in Africa from 1500 to 1700 AD.
TEXT.Chinese: 奥罗莫火枪手是公元1500年至1700年在非洲繁殖的野蛮人。

TEXT.English: Oromo Warrior
TEXT.Chinese: 奥罗莫火枪手

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Spies[COLOR_REVERT] can settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Spy[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, can construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Secret Service[COLOR_REVERT] building, is invisible to all units, can explore rival territory and can infiltrate another player's city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大间谍[COLOR_REVERT]可用于探察敌方领地，大量增加针对特定文明的谍报点数，或是建造[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]苏格兰场[COLOR_REVERT]以提升谍报点数产出。

TEXT.English: Keshik
TEXT.Chinese: 蒙古怯薛

TEXT.English: Buddhist Bhikku
TEXT.Chinese: 佛教僧人

TEXT.English: Dromon
TEXT.Chinese: 拜占庭战舰

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ship of the Lines[COLOR_REVERT] can bombard city defenses and are basic [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Naval Units[COLOR_REVERT] in the late Renaissance.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]主力战舰[COLOR_REVERT]是木质舰船发展的最高峰，虽然航速不及[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]三桅战舰[COLOR_REVERT]，但却拥有强得多的攻击力。

TEXT.English: Huscarl
TEXT.Chinese: 维京战士

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Impi[COLOR_REVERT] is a Barbarian unit that spawns in the Sahara and in Sub-Equatorial Africa from 450 to 1700 AD.
TEXT.Chinese: 祖鲁矛兵是祖鲁人特有的强大肉搏单位（替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]），该单位天然拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]机动能力[COLOR_REVERT]晋升，非常适宜对抗骑乘单位。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephants[COLOR_REVERT] are able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT], don't receive defensive bonuses and have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 这种早期骑乘作战单位速度较慢，但比骑射手等单位更强大。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Imams[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Islamic Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT]) can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Islam[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: 使用此传教单位传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伊斯兰教[COLOR_REVERT]到友好城市（或对手的城市，如果双方[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]）。如果拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]克尔白天房[COLOR_REVERT]将可增加收入。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Minuteman[COLOR_REVERT], the American replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketeer[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]March[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: 一分钟人是美国文明的特色单位，替代来复枪兵。只需花费等同于火枪手的产能即可生产他们。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Kobukson[COLOR_REVERT], the Korean replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleass[COLOR_REVERT], has two additional strength points and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill I[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill II[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Kobukson[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gallass[COLOR_REVERT]的韩语替代品，它有两个额外的强度点，并且以[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill I[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill II[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mobile Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] cannot capture enemy cities or units, don't receive defensive bonuses, have a combat bonus when attacking cities, cause collateral damage, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and can bombard city defenses.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]自行火炮[COLOR_REVERT]是最快速、最强大的压制武器，同时拥有对压制武器的额外战斗力加成。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Merkava[COLOR_REVERT], the Israeli replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Main Battle Tank[COLOR_REVERT], receives a defensive bonus, begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ambush[COLOR_REVERT] promotion, and has no resource requirements.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]梅卡瓦主战坦克[COLOR_REVERT]是以色列替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]主战坦克[COLOR_REVERT]，获得防御加成，从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伏击[COLOR_REVERT]开始，没有资源需求。

TEXT.English: Cossack
TEXT.Chinese: 哥萨克骑兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arquebusiers[COLOR_REVERT] are the first [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunpowder Unit[COLOR_REVERT] available.
TEXT.Chinese: 葡萄牙火绳枪兵是第一个可用的火药单位。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trebuchets[COLOR_REVERT] cannot capture enemy cities or units, don't receive defensive bonuses, have a combat bonus when attacking cities, cause collateral damage, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and can bombard city defenses.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]抛石机[COLOR_REVERT]非常适宜进行攻城战，能够快速破坏城防，并具有较高的撤退几率。进行直接攻击时能对同一地块的其他敌方单位造成附带伤害。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cataphract[COLOR_REVERT], the Byzantine replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancer[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Nobility[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Feudalism[COLOR_REVERT] technology and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shock[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重甲骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]是拜占庭的特色单位，替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑士[COLOR_REVERT]，战斗力更强，但是不对先发打击免疫。

TEXT.English: Winged Hussar
TEXT.Chinese: 波兰翼骑兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horsemen[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, can withdraw from combat, have a combat penalty in cities, have a bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Units[COLOR_REVERT] units and have a flank attack against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑兵[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]不获得防御奖励，可以退出战斗，在城市中受到战斗惩罚，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]攻城单位[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]有奖励，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弹射器单位有侧翼攻击。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT] can see the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nuclear Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] units, intercept air units and bombard city defenses and have an combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nuclear Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Torpedo Boat[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]驱逐舰[COLOR_REVERT]有一定的防空作用，而且还能很好的探测并摧毁敌方[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]潜艇[COLOR_REVERT]（对其他大多数单位隐形）。它们通常与[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]航空母舰[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]运输舰[COLOR_REVERT]一起行动。

TEXT.English: Dhow
TEXT.Chinese: 三角帆船

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Light Swordsmen[COLOR_REVERT] are the basic [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee units[COLOR_REVERT] or the Classical Era.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轻剑客[COLOR_REVERT]是基本的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]近战单位[COLOR_REVERT]或古典时代。

TEXT.English: Bandeirante
TEXT.Chinese: 葡萄牙探险家

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jet Fighters[COLOR_REVERT] can intercept enemy air units, destroy improvements, bomb city defenses, perform recon missions and damage enemy units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]喷气式战斗机[COLOR_REVERT]比普通[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战斗机[COLOR_REVERT]的作战范围更大，也能更有效的拦截敌方空军。

TEXT.English: Aucac
TEXT.Chinese: 印加战士

TEXT.English: Dharani
TEXT.Chinese: 三桅轻帆

TEXT.English: Arquebusier
TEXT.Chinese: 火绳枪兵

TEXT.English: Religious Persecutor
TEXT.Chinese: 宗教裁判

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ballista Elephant[COLOR_REVERT], the Khmer replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT], will attack [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry Units[COLOR_REVERT] in a stack before other units in combat outside of cities and has a combat bonus when attacking cities.
TEXT.Chinese: 此种强力肉搏兵种是高棉的特色单位，替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战象[COLOR_REVERT]，可优先攻击敌军集群中的骑乘单位，充分发挥其克制骑兵的特长。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gallic Warrior[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in Europe from 650 to 110 BC.
TEXT.Chinese: 高卢战士是凯尔特人特有的强大肉搏单位（替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑士[COLOR_REVERT]），该单位天然拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]游击一级[COLOR_REVERT]晋升，非常适宜丘陵防御作战。

TEXT.English: Firelancer
TEXT.Chinese: 神机营

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Work Boats[COLOR_REVERT] can create [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Whaling boats[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Offshore Platforms[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marine Reserves[COLOR_REVERT], cannot enter the ocean until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Optics[COLOR_REVERT] and cannot pass capes until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Cartography[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 这种非武装船只可用于建造渔船、捕鲸船和海上平台（游戏后期）。[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工船[COLOR_REVERT]不能进入大洋。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Conquistador[COLOR_REVERT], the Spanish replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cuirassier[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Exploration[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Combined Arms[COLOR_REVERT] technology, receives a defensive bonus, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT], has an attack bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT] except for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pikeman[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Militia[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 这种强大的骑乘单位（西班牙用以取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]胸甲骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]）在攻击肉搏部队时拥有加成，并且可以获得地形防御加成，这不同与其他骑乘单位。

TEXT.English: Digger
TEXT.Chinese: 澳新军团

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cho Ko Nu[COLOR_REVERT], the Chinese replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Crossbowman[COLOR_REVERT], has an extra first strike and causes collateral damage.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]诸葛弩[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弩手[COLOR_REVERT]的中国替代品，它有额外的第一一击，并造成附带伤害。

TEXT.English: Light Swordsman
TEXT.Chinese: 轻剑客

TEXT.English: Oghuz
TEXT.Chinese: 土库曼骑兵

TEXT.English: Hussar
TEXT.Chinese: 轻骑兵

TEXT.English: Legion
TEXT.Chinese: 罗马军团

TEXT.English: Balangay
TEXT.Chinese: 菲律宾划艇

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Skirmishers[COLOR_REVERT] have one first strike, can withdraw from combat, cause collateral damage and have an attack bonus in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]hills[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]forests[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]rainforests[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]散兵[COLOR_REVERT]有一次第一次攻击，可以退出战斗，造成附带伤害并且在[COLOR_REVERT]山[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_REVERT]森林[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_REVERT]雨林[COLOR_REVERT]有攻击加成。

TEXT.English: Corsair
TEXT.Chinese: 摩尔私掠舰

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]ICBMs[COLOR_REVERT] can nuke enemy lands and cannot be moved from the city it is constructed in.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战略导弹[COLOR_REVERT]能攻击敌方城市，造成建筑、部队和附近地区的极大损伤。

TEXT.English: Great Statesman
TEXT.Chinese: 大政治家

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Guaranteed to Capture [LINK=UNIT_SLAVE]Slaves[\LINK]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]保证捕获[LINK=UNIT_SLAVE]从机[\LINK]

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]New cities start with additional population
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]新城市从人口增加开始

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Cannot Spread [LINK=literal]%s1[\LINK] within a Civilization that has a Different State Religion
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]无法在具有不同国家宗教的文明中传播[LINK=literal]%s1[\LINK]

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Bombard[COLOR_REVERT], the Ottoman replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus when attacking cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大轰炸[COLOR_REVERT]，奥斯曼帝国取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轰炸[COLOR_REVERT]，在攻击城市时有战斗奖励。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Eight Banner[COLOR_REVERT], the Manchurian replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cuirassier[COLOR_REVERT], has a high withdraw chance.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]八旗军[COLOR_REVERT]，满清文明取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]胸甲骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]有很高的退出机会。

TEXT.English: Pioneer
TEXT.Chinese: 美国大篷车

TEXT.English: Architect
TEXT.Chinese: 也门建筑师

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rattan Archer[COLOR_REVERT], the Vietnamese replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Longbowman[COLOR_REVERT], has an additional first strike, has a higher withdraw chance and does collateral damage to more units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]藤弓手[COLOR_REVERT]，越南替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]长弓手[COLOR_REVERT]，有额外的第一次打击，有更高的撤退机会，并对更多单位造成附带伤害。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Samurai[COLOR_REVERT], the Japanese replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and cannot be built with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] resource.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]武士[COLOR_REVERT]，日本人取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重剑手[COLOR_REVERT]，从[COLOR_REVERT]领导层[COLOR_REVERT]晋升开始，不能用[COLOR_REVERT]铜[COLOR_REVERT]资源建立。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archers[COLOR_REVERT] have one first strike, have a defensive bonus in cities, have a defensive bonus in hills and have a bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Light Cavalry Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 这种原始的射击部队是最初期用来防御你的城市的明智选择。它有机会获得1个先发打击点数，在城市和丘陵地带可获得额外防御加成。

TEXT.English: East Indiaman
TEXT.Chinese: 东印度商船

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Keshik[COLOR_REVERT], the Mongol replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancer[COLOR_REVERT] doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resource, has an additional movement point, causes collateral damage, has a first strike, and receives a combat bonus when attacking cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]克什克[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]，蒙古人代替[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]长矛[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]不需要[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]资源，有额外的移动点，造成附带伤害，有第一次打击，并且在攻击城市时获得战斗加成。

TEXT.English: Dog Soldier
TEXT.Chinese: 安第斯战士

TEXT.English: Hoplite
TEXT.Chinese: 希腊方阵步兵

TEXT.English: Mangudai
TEXT.Chinese: 蒙古突骑

TEXT.English: War Galley
TEXT.Chinese: 战斗桨帆船

TEXT.English: Asvaka
TEXT.Chinese: 伊朗骑兵

TEXT.English: Asharittu Bowman
TEXT.Chinese: 巴比伦长弓手

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can Resolve a Crisis
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]可以解决危机

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Varu[COLOR_REVERT], the Indian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Elephant[COLOR_REVERT], requires [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT] instead of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horses[COLOR_REVERT], is more expensive, has two additional strength points and one less movement point, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]瓦鲁[COLOR_REVERT]，印第安人取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战象[COLOR_REVERT]，需要[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]象牙[COLOR_REVERT]，而不是[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]马[COLOR_REVERT]，更贵，有两个额外的力量点和一个较少的移动点，能够进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丛林[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]雨林[COLOR_REVERT]，并且对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗加成。

TEXT.English: Lanternas
TEXT.Chinese: 热那亚战船

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Camel Archers[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, can withdraw from combat, have a combat bonus on open terrain, have a bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry Units[COLOR_REVERT] units, have a combat bonus in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Desert[COLOR_REVERT] and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Desert Adaptation[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骆驼弓箭手[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]不获得防御加成，可以退出战斗，在开阔地形上有战斗加成，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重骑兵单位有加成，在[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]沙漠[COLOR_REVERT]中获得战斗奖励，并从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]沙漠适应[COLOR_REVERT]升级开始。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Scholars[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Confucian Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT]) can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Confucianism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: 使用此传教单位传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]儒学[COLOR_REVERT]到友好城市（或对手的城市，如果双方[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]）。如果拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]孔庙[COLOR_REVERT]将可增加收入。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]City Builder[COLOR_REVERT], the Harappan replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Settler[COLOR_REVERT], can found new cities that start with additional population.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]哈拉帕移民[COLOR_REVERT]，替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]定居者[COLOR_REVERT]的哈拉帕人，可以找到以额外人口开始的新城市。

TEXT.English: Pombos
TEXT.Chinese: 刚果战士

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Prophets[COLOR_REVERT] can begin golden ages, discover new technologies, settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Prophet[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and can construct [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]All Saints' Church[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Church of the Holy Sepulchre[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Hagia Sophia[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Masjid al-Haram[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Mahabodhi[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kashi Vishwanath[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Kong Lin[COLOR_REVERT], the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Dai Miao[COLOR_REVERT] and the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Adur Farnbag[COLOR_REVERT] World Wonders and can perform a Great Mission.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大预言家[COLOR_REVERT]允许你立即建成宗教[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]圣坛[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Madeireiro[COLOR_REVERT], the Brazilian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Labourer[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woodsman II[COLOR_REVERT] promotion and provides extra gold and production when it chops jungles, rainforest and forests.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伐木工人[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]劳工[COLOR_REVERT]的巴西替代品，它以[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woodsman II[COLOR_REVERT]促销活动开始，在砍伐丛林、雨林和森林时提供额外的黄金和产量。

TEXT.English: Cog
TEXT.Chinese: 运输船

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannons[COLOR_REVERT] cannot capture enemy cities or units, don't receive defensive bonuses, have a combat bonus when attacking cities, cause collateral damage, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and can bombard city defenses.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]加农炮[COLOR_REVERT]可以轰击敌方城防，当战斗失败时也有一定几率可安全撤退。当投石车攻击时，会对和目标处于同一位置的其他单位造成附带损害。

TEXT.English: Lancer
TEXT.Chinese: 骑兵

TEXT.English: Main Battle Tank
TEXT.Chinese: 主战坦克

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Creates 2 [ICON_CULTURE] when it ends its turn in a city
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]产生2点文化 [ICON_CULTURE] 每个回合

TEXT.English: Camel Gunner
TEXT.Chinese: 骆驼枪手

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Patiyodha[COLOR_REVERT], the Indian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Longbowman[COLOR_REVERT], requires [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Nobility[COLOR_REVERT] instead of [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Commune[COLOR_REVERT], has one less strength point, is cheaper, has an combat bonus when attacking [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT], is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Formation[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woodsman I[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Patiyodha[COLOR_REVERT]，印度替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Longbowman[COLOR_REVERT]，需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]贵族[COLOR_REVERT]，而不是[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]公社[COLOR_REVERT]，力量点更少，价格更低，在攻击[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丛林[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]雨林[COLOR_REVERT]时有战斗奖励，能够进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丛林[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]雨林[COLOR_REVERT]，并以[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]阵型[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伍德斯曼I[COLOR_REVERT]促销活动开始。

TEXT.English: Biplane
TEXT.Chinese: 双翼飞机

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Aucac[COLOR_REVERT], the Incan replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Mining[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Bloomery[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resource, has a combat bonus against [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Archery Units[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT] and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Combat I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]印加战士[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑客[COLOR_REVERT]的印加替代品，需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]挖掘[COLOR_REVERT]技术，不需要[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Bloomery[COLOR_REVERT]技术，不需要[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]资源，对[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]射箭单位[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]近战单位[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗奖励，并从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]战斗I[COLOR_REVERT]升级开始。

TEXT.English: Llanero
TEXT.Chinese: 哥伦比亚骑兵

TEXT.English: Huluganni
TEXT.Chinese: 赫梯战车
单位信息

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, can withdraw from combat, have a combat bonus on open terrain, has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Howitzer[COLOR_REVERT] units and has a flank attack against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trebuchet[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Atillery[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Howitzer[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种最强大的骑乘单位特别适于用于探索地形，并能从战斗中撤退。在攻击[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]加农炮[COLOR_REVERT]时拥有奖励加成，但不能获得防御时的地形奖励。

TEXT.English: Confucian Scholar
TEXT.Chinese: 儒士

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Asvaka[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in Central Asia from 30 to 220 AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Asvaka[COLOR_REVERT]是公元30年至220年在中亚繁衍的野蛮人单位。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can Only Spread in Historical Regions for [LINK=literal]%s1[\LINK] or if it is the Prevalent State Religion
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]只能在 [LINK=literal]%s1[\LINK] 的历史区域传播，或者如果它是流行的国家宗教

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dromon[COLOR_REVERT], the Byzantine replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Galley[COLOR_REVERT], has one additional strength point and causes collateral damage.
TEXT.Chinese: 拜占庭人取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战舰[COLOR_REVERT]的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dromon[COLOR_REVERT]，有一个额外的力量点，并造成附带伤害。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Biplanes[COLOR_REVERT] can intercept enemy air units, destroy improvements, bomb city defenses, perform recon missions and damage enemy units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]双翼飞机[COLOR_REVERT]可以拦截敌人的空中单位，摧毁改进，轰炸城市防御，执行侦察任务和损害敌人的单位。

TEXT.English: Great Spy
TEXT.Chinese: 大间谍

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketeers[COLOR_REVERT] requires no special resources.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火枪手[COLOR_REVERT]不需要特殊资源。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dog Soldier[COLOR_REVERT] is a Barbarian unit that spawns in Central North America and the Andes Mountains from 600 - 1800 AD.
TEXT.Chinese: 狗兵是一个野蛮人单位，从公元600-1800年在北美中部和安第斯山脉繁殖。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Explorers[COLOR_REVERT] can enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT], gain only positive bonuses from Tribal villages, can only defend, ignores terrain movement costs and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerilla I[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woodsman I[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: 组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]探险家[COLOR_REVERT]探索未知地域，相比[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]侦察兵[COLOR_REVERT]移动力更高；探访[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]部落村庄[COLOR_REVERT]时能获得更好的收获。但是他们不能用于攻击。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Khampa[COLOR_REVERT], the Tibetan replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archer[COLOR_REVERT], is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT], can explore rival territory and has an attack bonus when attacking cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]坎帕[COLOR_REVERT]，藏人代替[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]马弓箭手[COLOR_REVERT]，能够进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丛林[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]雨林[COLOR_REVERT]，可以探索敌对领土，在攻击城市时有攻击加成。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tercio[COLOR_REVERT], the Spanish replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arquebusier[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pinch[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Formation[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]西班牙大方阵[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arquebusier[COLOR_REVERT]的西班牙语替代品，它以[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]夹点[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]形成[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: Ballista
TEXT.Chinese: 罗马弩炮

TEXT.English: Rocketeer
TEXT.Chinese: 泰米尔火弹兵

TEXT.English: Karolin
TEXT.Chinese: 卡罗林枪手

TEXT.English: Numidian Cavalry
TEXT.Chinese: 努米迪亚骑兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gurus[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hindu Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT]) can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Hinduism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: 使用此传教单位传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]印度教[COLOR_REVERT]到友好城市（或对手的城市，如果双方[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]）。如果拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]印度教黄金殿[COLOR_REVERT]将可增加收入。

TEXT.English: Kelebolo
TEXT.Chinese: 马里游击兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Magi[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Zoroastrian Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT]) can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Zoroastrianism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Magi[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]琐罗亚斯德传教士[COLOR_REVERT]）可以在友好城市（或与您有[COLOR_REVERT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]的竞争城市）传播[COLOR_REVERT]琐罗亚斯德教[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapults[COLOR_REVERT] cannot capture enemy cities or units, don't receive defensive bonuses, have a combat bonus when attacking cities, cause collateral damage, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and can bombard city defenses.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]投石车[COLOR_REVERT]可以轰击敌方城防，当战斗失败时也有一定几率可安全撤退。当投石车攻击时，会对和目标处于同一位置的其他单位造成附带损害。

TEXT.English: Camel Archer
TEXT.Chinese: 骆驼射手

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grenadier Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT], the Argentine replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dragoon[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: 这是一种能够克制来复枪兵的骑座单位

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Machine Guns[COLOR_REVERT] can only defend, have one first strike, can intercept aircraft, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunpowder Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重机枪[COLOR_REVERT]是有力的防御武器，尤其是在对付敌方的火器单位时。重机枪部队不能发起攻击，因此通常被用于守卫城市。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can Conduct Diplomatic Missions
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]可以执行外交任务

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Camel Riders[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, can withdraw from combat, have a combat penalty in cities, have a bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Units[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry Units[COLOR_REVERT] units, have a flank attack against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT] units, have a combat bonus in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Desert[COLOR_REVERT] and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Desert Adaptation[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骆驼骑兵[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]不获得防御奖励，可以退出战斗，在城市受到战斗惩罚，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]攻城单位[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重骑兵单位[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]有奖励，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弹弓单位进行侧翼攻击，在[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]沙漠[COLOR_REVERT]中获得战斗奖励，并从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]沙漠适应[COLOR_REVERT]升级开始。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarines[COLOR_REVERT] can see [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nuclear Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] units, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ice[COLOR_REVERT], can explore rival territory, can withdraw from combat and are invisible to all units except [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Destroyers[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarines[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Attack Submarines[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]潜艇[COLOR_REVERT]对大多数单位隐身。它们能探索敌方区域并运载特殊单位，但易遭受敌方[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]驱逐舰[COLOR_REVERT]和其他潜艇的攻击。

TEXT.English: Druzhina
TEXT.Chinese: 基辅罗斯重矛兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Carriers[COLOR_REVERT] can carry three [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Biplanes[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fighters[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jet Fighters[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]航空母舰[COLOR_REVERT]本身只有中等战力，但它们的主要作用是运载三架[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战斗机[COLOR_REVERT]。战斗机可用于防空、侦察、轰炸敌方部队和城市。

TEXT.English: Rozwi Warrior
TEXT.Chinese: 罗兹维矛兵

TEXT.English: Baghlah
TEXT.Chinese: 阿曼轻帆

TEXT.English: Rattan Archer
TEXT.Chinese: 藤弓手

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Drones[COLOR_REVERT] are invisible to all units, can explore rival territory, can destroy improvements, bomb city defenses, perform recon missions, damage enemy units and have an increased chance to evade interception.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]无人机[COLOR_REVERT]对所有单位都是隐形的，可以探索敌方领土，可以摧毁改进，轰炸城市防御，执行侦察任务，损害敌方单位，并有更多的机会逃避拦截。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Infantry[COLOR_REVERT] is the basic [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunpowder Unit[COLOR_REVERT] of the Modern Era.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种部队是第一种现代军事单位，可以对抗大量火器部队。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Orthodox Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT]) can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Orthodoxy[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]东正教传教士[COLOR_REVERT]）可以在友好城市（或与您有[COLOR_REVERT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]的竞争城市）传播[COLOR_REVERT]正统观念。

TEXT.English: Heavy Swordsman
TEXT.Chinese: 重剑手

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Legion[COLOR_REVERT], the Roman replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], has two additional strength points, is more expensive and can construct [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roman Roads[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]军团[COLOR_REVERT]，罗马取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑客[COLOR_REVERT]，有两个额外的力量点，价格更高，可以建造[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]罗马道路[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Zero[COLOR_REVERT], the Japanese replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fighter[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper, can evade interception and has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Water Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]日本战机[COLOR_REVERT]，日本取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战斗机[COLOR_REVERT]，更便宜，可以躲避拦截，并且对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]水上部队[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗加成。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cidainh[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit roaming in Gaul.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cidainh[COLOR_REVERT]是一个在高卢漫游的野蛮人单位。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Swordsmen[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus when attacking cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重剑手[COLOR_REVERT]攻击城市时有战斗奖励。

TEXT.English: Cidainh
TEXT.Chinese: 希丹

TEXT.English: Slave
TEXT.Chinese: 奴隶

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleons[COLOR_REVERT] have three cargo spaces and can withdraw from combat.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大帆船[COLOR_REVERT]是大航海时代最好的运输船。它可以运载三个单位，并能安全地出入大洋。

TEXT.English: Dragoon
TEXT.Chinese: 龙骑兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Frigates[COLOR_REVERT] are basic [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Naval Units[COLOR_REVERT] in the early Renaissance.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]三桅战舰[COLOR_REVERT]是游戏中最强大的木制战舰。它能击沉敌舰并炮轰敌方海滨城防。

TEXT.English: Impi
TEXT.Chinese: 祖鲁矛兵

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]East Indianman[COLOR_REVERT], the Dutch replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleon[COLOR_REVERT], has two additional strength points, has an additional cargo space and can explore rival territory.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]东印度商船[COLOR_REVERT]，荷兰人取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]加隆[COLOR_REVERT]，有两个额外的优势点，有一个额外的货舱，可以探索竞争领土。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Daoshis[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Taoist Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT]) can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Taoism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: 使用此传教单位传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道教[COLOR_REVERT]到友好城市（或对手的城市，如果双方[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]）。如果拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]岱庙[COLOR_REVERT]将可增加收入。

TEXT.English: Sacred Band
TEXT.Chinese: 腓尼基矛兵

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bandeirante[COLOR_REVERT], the Portuguese replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Explorer[COLOR_REVERT], has four more strength points, can attack, can withdraw from combat and is guaranteed to capture slaves.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bandeirante[COLOR_REVERT]，葡萄牙人取代了[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]探险家[COLOR_REVERT]，拥有四个额外的力量点，可以攻击，可以从战斗中撤退，并保证捕获奴隶。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravels[COLOR_REVERT] can explore rival territory and carry one [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Scout[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Explorer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionary[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spy[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 这种小型快速帆船能探索大洋和敌方区域。[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轻帆船[COLOR_REVERT]可以运载一个特殊单位――[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]侦察兵[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]探险家[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]间谍[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]或者[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]历史伟人[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Bombers[COLOR_REVERT] can destroy improvements, bomb city defenses, perform recon missions, damage enemy units, have an increased chance to evade interception, causes collateral damage and has a combat malus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Water Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]隐形轰炸机[COLOR_REVERT]可以攻击敌军地面部队（也能攻击水面部队，但效果略差）。轰炸会造成附带损害。地方空军很难拦截并击落隐形轰炸机。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Medjay[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in Egypt from 800 BC to 1300 AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]守护者[COLOR_REVERT]是公元前800年至公元1300年在埃及诞生的野蛮人单位。

TEXT.English: Grenzer
TEXT.Chinese: 神罗边防军

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dhow[COLOR_REVERT], the Swahili replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cog[COLOR_REVERT], provides gold when stationed in foreign coastal cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]三角帆船[COLOR_REVERT]是斯瓦希里的运输船替代品，可在外国沿海城市提供黄金。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Religious Persecutors[COLOR_REVERT] can remove non-state religions from a city.
TEXT.Chinese: 宗教迫害者可以将非国家宗教从城市中移除。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Djong[COLOR_REVERT], the Indonesian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galeass[COLOR_REVERT], requires [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Compass[COLOR_REVERT] instead of [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Gunpowder[COLOR_REVERT], has an additional defensive combat bonus on [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Coast[COLOR_REVERT] and has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateers[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 印度尼西亚替代[COLOR UNIT TEXT]Galeass[COLOR REVERT]的[COLOR UNIT TEXT]Djong[COLOR REVERT]需要[COLOR TECH TEXT]指南针[COLOR REVERT]，而不是[COLOR TECH TEXT]火药[COLOR REVERT]，在[COLOR HIGHLIGHT TEXT]海岸[COLOR REVERT]有额外的防御战斗加成，并且对[COLOR UNIT TEXT]私掠船[COLOR REVERT]有战斗加成。

TEXT.English: Immortal
TEXT.Chinese: 波斯长矛兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearmen[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 组建此类早期肉搏单位用于对付大量骑乘单位。

TEXT.English: Ghazi
TEXT.Chinese: 阿拉伯重剑士

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Spearmen[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重矛人[COLOR_REVERT]对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗加成。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Strelets[COLOR_REVERT], the Russian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arquebusier[COLOR_REVERT], has one additional movement point and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]City Garrison I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]俄国卫兵[COLOR_REVERT]，俄国人取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arquebusier[COLOR_REVERT]，有一个额外的移动点，以[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]城市卫戍I[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: Balestriere
TEXT.Chinese: 热那亚弩手

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rocketeer[COLOR_REVERT], the Tamil replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grenadier[COLOR_REVERT], has two additional strength points and does collateral damage to two more units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火箭兵[COLOR_REVERT]，泰米尔人代替[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]掷弹兵[COLOR_REVERT]，有两个额外的力量点，并对另外两个单位造成附带伤害。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missile Cruiser[COLOR_REVERT] can bombard city defenses, causes collateral damage and can carry four [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missile Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 此种现代舰船是杀伤力最强的海上单位，可携带四枚导弹。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cruisers[COLOR_REVERT] can bombard city defenses and are basic [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Naval Units[COLOR_REVERT] in the Industrial Era.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]巡洋舰[COLOR_REVERT]可以轰炸城市防御，是工业时代的基本[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]海军单位[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fighters[COLOR_REVERT] can intercept enemy air units, destroy improvements, bomb city defenses, perform recon missions and damage enemy units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战斗机[COLOR_REVERT]可攻击敌方空军单位并侦察敌方领土，当其被配置在[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]航空母舰[COLOR_REVERT]上时非常有用。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Settlers[COLOR_REVERT] can found new cities.
TEXT.Chinese: 组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]移民[COLOR_REVERT]建立新城市，扩张你的文明。

TEXT.English: Zoroastrian Magus
TEXT.Chinese: 祆教祭司

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Militia[COLOR_REVERT] have a defensive bonus in cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]民兵[COLOR_REVERT]在城市有防御加成。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Albion Legion[COLOR_REVERT], the Colombian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Grenadier[COLOR_REVERT], has an additional movement point and is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 作为掷弹兵的替代兵种，移动力和攻城能力更强。

TEXT.English: Pistolier
TEXT.Chinese: 手枪骑兵

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mohawk[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in Western North America from 1500 to 1850 AD.
TEXT.Chinese: 莫霍克是一个野蛮人单位，公元1500年至1850年在北美西部繁殖。

TEXT.English: +2 Experience for every civilization with the same state religion, a stronger army, and pleased or better relations
TEXT.Chinese: +2经验 对于每个有相同的国家宗教信仰，更强大的军队，友好或更好的关系的文明

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Engineers[COLOR_REVERT] can begin golden ages, discover new technologies, settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Engineer[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, can construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Manufactory[COLOR_REVERT] building and can hurry production in a city.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大工程师[COLOR_REVERT]能立刻完成城市当前的建设项目。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pombos[COLOR_REVERT], the Congolese replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunpowder Units[COLOR_REVERT] and doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Copper[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resources.
TEXT.Chinese: 刚果人取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重剑手[COLOR_REVERT]，可以进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丛林[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]雨林[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]沼泽[COLOR_REVERT]，对[COLOR_UNIT_REVERT]火药单位[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗奖励，并且不需要[COLOR_HIGHT_TEXT]铜[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]资源。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Corvette[COLOR_REVERT], the Canadian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Destroyer[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper, has four less strength points, has two additional movement points, loses the ability to bombard cities and starts with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sentry[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]护卫舰[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]，加拿大的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]驱逐舰的替代品[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]，更便宜，力量点少四点，有两个额外的移动点，失去轰炸城市的能力，从[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]哨兵[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]提升。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catholic Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT]) can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Catholicism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_REVERT]（[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]天主教传教士[COLOR_REVERT]）可以在友好城市（或与您有[COLOR_REVERT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]的竞争城市）传播[COLOR_REVERT]天主教[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Sacred Band[COLOR_REVERT], the Phoenician replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearman[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus when attacking and defending cities and starts with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Amphibious[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]圣带[COLOR_REVERT]，腓尼基人取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]，在攻防城市时有战斗奖励，并从[COLOR戋u HIGHLIGHT戋TEXT]两栖[COLOR_REVERT]升级开始。

TEXT.English: Minuteman
TEXT.Chinese: 一分钟人

TEXT.English: Galleass
TEXT.Chinese: 帆船

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Axemen[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: 这种肉搏单位在对付其他肉搏单位时具有特殊战斗优势加成。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Kommando[COLOR_REVERT], the Boer replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT], is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mobility[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]科曼多骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]是波尔人对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]的替代品，能够进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丛林[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]雨林[COLOR_REVERT]，并从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]移动性[COLOR_REVERT]开始。

TEXT.English: Redcoat
TEXT.Chinese: 皇家来复枪兵

TEXT.English: Khagan
TEXT.Chinese: 卡扎尔可汗

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Balangay[COLOR_REVERT], the Philippine replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galley[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper and has a higher withdraw chance.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]菲律宾划艇[COLOR_REVERT]是菲律宾替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]桨帆船[COLOR_REVERT]的产品，价格便宜，退出机会更高。

TEXT.English: Carrack
TEXT.Chinese: 卡拉克船

TEXT.English: Nuclear Submarine
TEXT.Chinese: 核潜艇

TEXT.English: Camel Rider
TEXT.Chinese: 骆驼骑兵

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mangudai[COLOR_REVERT], the Mongolian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archer[COLOR_REVERT], has two additional strength points and one additional movement point.
TEXT.Chinese: 蒙古语替代的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]马弓箭手[COLOR_REVERT]，有两个额外的力量点和一个额外的移动点。

TEXT.English: Khampa
TEXT.Chinese: 康藏骑兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Statesmen[COLOR_REVERT] can begin golden ages, discover new technologies, reform the government, resolve a crisis, perform a diplomatic mission, explore rival territory, settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Statesman[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and can construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Administrative Center[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.Chinese: 伟大的政治家可以开始黄金时代，发现新技术，改革政府，解决危机，执行外交任务，探索敌对领土，作为[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伟大政治家[COLOR_REVERT]专家在城市定居，并可建造 [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]行政中心[COLOR_REVERT]大楼。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Panzer[COLOR_REVERT], the Prussian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tank[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Infantry[COLOR_REVERT] units and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]德国坦克[COLOR_REVERT]是德国的特色单位（替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]坦克[COLOR_REVERT]），在攻击普通坦克时占有优势。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can remove non-state religions and associated buildings
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]可以移除非国家宗教和相关建筑

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Fusilier[COLOR_REVERT], the Prussian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketeer[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill I[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill II[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]燧发枪士兵[COLOR_REVERT]，普鲁士取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火枪手[COLOR_REVERT]，以[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]钻一[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]钻二[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: Steamship
TEXT.Chinese: 轮船

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mobile Guard[COLOR_REVERT], the Arabian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancer[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resource, can withdraw from combat and doesn't have a combat penalty when attacking cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]移动卫兵[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancer[COLOR_REVERT]的阿拉伯替代品，不需要[COLOR戋u HIGHLIGHT戋TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]资源，可以退出战斗，攻击城市时不受战斗惩罚。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Immortal[COLOR_REVERT], the Persian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearman[COLOR_REVERT], has an attack bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archers[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]March[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]波斯长矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]，波斯人取代了[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]长矛人[COLOR_REVERT]，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弓箭手[COLOR_REVERT]有攻击加成，价格更便宜，并且从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]三月[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receives [ICON_FOOD] for Defeating Enemy Units
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]获得[ICON_FOOD]以击败敌军

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]New cities in North America start with a defender and a worker
TEXT.Chinese: 北美的新城市从一名后卫和一名工人开始

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Kelebolo[COLOR_REVERT], the Mali replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Skirmisher[COLOR_REVERT], has additional strength in deserts and against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee units[COLOR_REVERT] and is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 在沙漠和对抗近战单位的战斗中，马里取代了游击兵[COLOR_REVERT]，并且能够进入[COLOR_REVERT]丛林[COLOR_REVERT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]雨林[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]和沼泽[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Riflemen[COLOR_REVERT] are the basic [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunpowder Units[COLOR_REVERT] of the Industrial Era.
TEXT.Chinese: 训练这种中等战力的火器部队可以有效地对抗[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]近代骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]等骑乘单位。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mobile SAMs[COLOR_REVERT] cannot capture enemy cities and untis, can intercept aircraft and have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Helicopter Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]防空导弹车[COLOR_REVERT]是最有效的陆基防空武器。专门用于拦截敌方固定翼飞机，或是对付[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]武装直升机[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]2 [ICON_GOLD] when stationed in a foreign coastal city (max one unit per city)
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]2[ICON_GOLD]驻扎在外国沿海城市时（每个城市最多一个单位）

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Asharittu Bowman[COLOR_REVERT], the Babylonian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archer[COLOR_REVERT], causes collateral damage when attacking enemy units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] 阿沙里图长弓手 [COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT] Archer [COLOR_REVERT]的巴比伦替代品，在攻击敌方单位时会造成附带伤害。

TEXT.English: Hindu Guru
TEXT.Chinese: 印度教宗师

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Galleys[COLOR_REVERT] cannot enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ocean[COLOR_REVERT], cannot pass [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Capes[COLOR_REVERT] until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Compass[COLOR_REVERT], have a combat bonus attacking on [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]coast[COLOR_REVERT] and can withdraw from combat.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重型战舰[COLOR_REVERT]不能进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]海洋[COLOR_REVERT]，不能通过[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]斗篷[COLOR_REVERT]，直到[COLOR U TECH U TEXT]指南针[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗奖励攻击[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]海岸[COLOR_REVERT]，并且可以退出战斗。

TEXT.English: Man-of-War
TEXT.Chinese: 英国战船

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Vulture[COLOR_REVERT] is a Barbarian unit that spawns in the Middle East from 1600 BC to 300 AD.
TEXT.Chinese: 此种早期肉搏兵种是苏美尔的特色单位，替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]斧兵[COLOR_REVERT]，战斗力相当于[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑士[COLOR_REVERT]，并仍拥有针对肉搏单位的战斗加成。

TEXT.English: Janissary
TEXT.Chinese: 苏丹亲兵

TEXT.English: City Builder
TEXT.Chinese: 哈拉帕移民

TEXT.English: Aztec Slave
TEXT.Chinese: 阿兹特克奴隶

TEXT.English: Mehal Sefari
TEXT.Chinese: 埃塞尔比亚步枪手

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Satellites[COLOR_REVERT] can see other [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Satellite[COLOR_REVERT] units, settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Research Satellite[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Commercial Satellite[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Military Satellite[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, can explore rival territory, are invisible to all units except [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Satellite[COLOR_REVERT] units and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sentry[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]卫星[COLOR_REVERT]可以看到其他[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]卫星[COLOR_REVERT]单元，作为[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]研究卫星[COLOR_REVERT]、[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]商业卫星[COLOR_REVERT]或[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]军事卫星[COLOR_REVERT]专家在一个城市定居，可以探索竞争领土，对所有单位都不可见，除了[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]卫星[COLOR_REVERT]单位，并以[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]哨兵[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spies[COLOR_REVERT] are invisible to all units, can explore rival territory, help thwart rival spies and can perform espionage missions.
TEXT.Chinese: 组建[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]间谍[COLOR_REVERT]查探敌方领土。并可实施[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]谍报任务[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Digger[COLOR_REVERT], the Australian replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Infantry[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]澳新军团[COLOR_REVERT]，澳大利亚替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]步兵[COLOR_REVERT]，首先是[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]演练I[COLOR_REVERT]推广。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Anti-Tanks[COLOR_REVERT] can intercept aircraft, have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Armored Units[COLOR_REVERT] and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ambush[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: 此种后期火器单位组建成本低廉，专用于克制装甲单位，并天然拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伏击能力[COLOR_REVERT]晋升。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rural[COLOR_REVERT], the Mexican replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper, receives a defensive bonus and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Combat I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rural[COLOR_REVERT]是墨西哥取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]的装备，价格更便宜，获得防御奖励，并从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]战斗I[COLOR_REVERT]升级开始。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Guard[COLOR_REVERT], the French replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dragoon[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pinch[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]守卫[COLOR_REVERT]，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]龙骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]的法国替代品，从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]夹[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]领导层[COLOR_REVERT]的晋升开始。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Brave[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in Central North America from 1700 to 1900 AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]印第安骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]是一个野蛮人单位，在公元1700年至1900年在北美中部繁衍。

TEXT.English: Siege Elephant
TEXT.Chinese: 攻城战象

TEXT.English: Horseman
TEXT.Chinese: 骑手

TEXT.English: Nuclear Bomber
TEXT.Chinese: 核轰炸机

TEXT.English: Catholic Missionary
TEXT.Chinese: 天主教传教士

TEXT.English: Militia
TEXT.Chinese: 民兵

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cossack[COLOR_REVERT], the Russian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hussar[COLOR_REVERT], requires [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Measurement[COLOR_REVERT] instead of [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Nationalism[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Biology[COLOR_REVERT], and has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 俄罗斯取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轻骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]哥萨克[COLOR_REVERT]，要求[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]测量[COLOR_REVERT]，而不是[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]民族主义[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_TECH_TEXT]生物[COLOR_REVERT]，并对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]挂载单位[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗加成。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ironclads[COLOR_REVERT] can bombard city defenses and are basic [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Naval Units[COLOR_REVERT] in the Industrial age.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]铁甲舰[COLOR_REVERT]速度缓慢而强大。它能炮击敌方城防但不能进入大洋。

TEXT.English: Merkava
TEXT.Chinese: 梅卡瓦主战坦克

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Native Slaves[COLOR_REVERT] build improvements including [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slave Plantations[COLOR_REVERT] and can settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slave[COLOR_REVERT] specialist.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]本地奴隶[COLOR_REVERT]建筑改进，包括[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]奴隶种植园[COLOR_REVERT]，可以作为[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]奴隶[COLOR_REVERT]专家在城市定居。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rabbits[COLOR_REVERT] are Barbarian units that spawn in Australia from 1860 AD.
TEXT.Chinese: 野兔，从公元1860年开始在澳大利亚繁殖。

TEXT.English: Punjabi Worker
TEXT.Chinese: 旁遮普工人

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lions[COLOR_REVERT] are Barbarian units that spawn in Africa from 3000 to 850 BC.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]狮子[COLOR_REVERT]是公元前3000年至850年在非洲繁殖的野蛮单位。

TEXT.English: Unit Information
TEXT.Chinese: 单位信息

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Redcoat[COLOR_REVERT], the English replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketeer[COLOR_REVERT], causes collateral damage.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种强大的火器近战部队（英国用以取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]来复枪兵[COLOR_REVERT]）在攻击骑乘单位及其他火器部队时可以得到一定加成。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Privateers[COLOR_REVERT] has hidden nationality can attack enemy units without declaring war, can withdraw from combat and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sentry[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]私掠舰[COLOR_REVERT]出现于游戏中期，最大特点是隐藏国籍，可在不宣战的情况下骚扰你的对手。

TEXT.English: Corvette
TEXT.Chinese: 加拿大护卫舰

TEXT.English: Waka
TEXT.Chinese: 波利尼西亚独木舟

TEXT.English: Satellite
TEXT.Chinese: 卫星

TEXT.English: Protestant Missionary
TEXT.Chinese: 新教传教士

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nuclear Bombers[COLOR_REVERT] can nuke enemy lands.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]核轰炸机[COLOR_REVERT]可以用核弹攻击敌人的土地。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Carrack[COLOR_REVERT], the Portuguese replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Caravel[COLOR_REVERT], can transport any unit, has an additional cargo space and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Sentry[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]卡拉克船[COLOR_REVERT]，葡萄牙语替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]运输船[COLOR_REVERT]，可以运输任何单位，具有额外的货舱，并以[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]哨兵[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Tanks[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Blitz[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]坦克[COLOR_REVERT]是很有效的进攻武器。它有2点移动力，并能在同一回合中攻击两次。坦克能轻易击溃任意现代之前出现的单位，但在防守时没有地形加成。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Marines[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Machine Gun[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Howitzer[COLOR_REVERT] units, are able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT] and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Amphibious[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: 训练这种强大的现代步兵可对抗[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]炮兵[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重机枪[COLOR_REVERT]。它天生拥有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]两栖作战[COLOR_REVERT]晋升，因此可以用它们从船上攻击，或跨河攻击。

TEXT.English: Arabia Camel Archer
TEXT.Chinese: 骆驼射手

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can Reform the Government
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]可以改革政府

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Paratroopers[COLOR_REVERT] can evade interception and can perform paradrops.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]伞兵[COLOR_REVERT]是出现于游戏后期的火器单位，能够在航程范围内[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]空降[COLOR_REVERT]至任何已探明的敌方地域。要注意敌方空军的动向，伞兵执行空降任务时可能遭到拦截。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Kyundaw[COLOR_REVERT], the Burmese replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Spearman[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungles[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforests[COLOR_REVERT], and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marshes[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Raider I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion, and has an attack bonus in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforests[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]缅甸重矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]是缅甸替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]的替代品，更便宜，可以进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丛林[COLOR_REVERT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]雨林[COLOR_REVERT]，和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]沼泽地[COLOR_REVERT]，从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]掠夺 I[COLOR_REVERT]提升开始，并在[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]雨林[COLOR_REVERT]中获得攻击加成。

TEXT.English: Varu
TEXT.Chinese: 印度象兵

TEXT.English: Patiyodha
TEXT.Chinese: 印度长弓手

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Scientists[COLOR_REVERT] can begin golden ages, discover new technologies, settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Scientist[COLOR_REVERT] specialist and can construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Academy[COLOR_REVERT] building.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大科学家[COLOR_REVERT]能创立[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]科学院[COLOR_REVERT]，极大地增加城市的研发投入。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rabbis[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jewish Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT]) can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Judaism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: 使用此传教单位传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]犹太教[COLOR_REVERT]到友好城市（或对手的城市，如果双方[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]）。如果拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]所罗门圣殿[COLOR_REVERT]将可增加收入。

TEXT.English: Vulture
TEXT.Chinese: 兀鹫战士

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gendarme[COLOR_REVERT], the French replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cuirassier[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pinch[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]宪兵队[COLOR_REVERT]，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]护甲队[COLOR_REVERT]的法文替代品，从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]夹[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]领导层[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Aztec Slaves[COLOR_REVERT] build improvements including [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slave Plantations[COLOR_REVERT], can settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Slave[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, can hurry production in a city and can be sacrificed in cities for temporary happiness.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]阿兹特克奴隶[COLOR_REVERT]建筑改进，包括[COLOR_REVERT]奴隶种植园[COLOR_REVERT]，可以作为[COLOR_REVERT]奴隶[COLOR_REVERT]专家在城市定居，可以在城市中加快生产，可以在城市中牺牲以获得暂时的幸福。

TEXT.English: Madeireiro
TEXT.Chinese: 巴西工人

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nuclear Submarines[COLOR_REVERT] can carry one [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Scout[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Explorer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Missionary[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spy[COLOR_REVERT] or [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Person[COLOR_REVERT], has an attack bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] units, can see [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Nuclear Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] units, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ice[COLOR_REVERT], can explore rival territory, can withdraw from combat and are invisible to all units except the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Destroyer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Stealth Destroyer[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Attack Submarine[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]核潜艇[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]可以携带一艘[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]侦察机[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]探险家[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]传教士[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]间谍[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]或[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大人物[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]潜艇[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]单位有攻击加成，可以参见[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]潜艇[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]核潜艇[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]单位，可以进入[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]冰[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]，可以探索敌方领土，可以退出战斗，对除[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]驱逐舰[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]以外的所有单位都不可见，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]隐形驱逐舰[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]潜艇[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]攻击潜艇[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]单位。

TEXT.English: Medjay
TEXT.Chinese: 埃及守护者

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mechanized Infantry[COLOR_REVERT] can intercept aircraft and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]March[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: 最强大的火器部队。较其他步兵移动更快，有一定几率拦截对方的飞行器。天生具有[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]长途行军[COLOR_REVERT]晋升

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pioneer[COLOR_REVERT], the American replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Settler[COLOR_REVERT], can defend itself and spawns a defender and a worker in when it founds a city in North America.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]拓荒者[COLOR_REVERT]，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]定居者[COLOR_REVERT]的美国替代者，当它在北美建立一座城市时，可以保护自己并在其中产生一名防御者和一名工人。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Merchants[COLOR_REVERT] can begin golden ages, discover new technologies, settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Merchant[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, can construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Stock Exchange[COLOR_REVERT] building, can explore rival territory and can conduct a trade mission.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大商业家[COLOR_REVERT]能在外国城市开展[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]贸易活动[COLOR_REVERT]，获得大笔金钱收入。外国城市距离本国越远越好。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleys[COLOR_REVERT] have two cargo spaces, cannot enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ocean[COLOR_REVERT], cannot pass [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Capes[COLOR_REVERT] until [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Compass[COLOR_REVERT] and can withdraw from combat.
TEXT.Chinese: 最早出现的武装船只，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]桨帆船[COLOR_REVERT]能运载两个地面单位。桨帆船不能进入大洋。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chang Suek[COLOR_REVERT], the Thai replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancer[COLOR_REVERT], requires [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Ivory[COLOR_REVERT] instead of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horse[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT], is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry Units[COLOR_REVERT] and receives an offensive bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arquebusier[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketeer[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]昌苏克[COLOR_REVERT]，泰国替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]柳叶刀[COLOR_REVERT]，需要[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]象牙[COLOR_REVERT]，而不是[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]马[COLOR_REVERT]，不需要[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]，能够进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丛林[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]雨林[COLOR_REVERT]，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]重骑兵单位[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗加成，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火箭炮单位[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火枪手单位[COLOR_REVERT]有攻击加成。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombers[COLOR_REVERT] can destroy improvements, lower city defenses, perform recon missions, damage enemy units, cause collateral damage and have a combat penalty against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Water Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轰炸机[COLOR_REVERT]是陆基航空兵。它们可以攻击敌军地面部队（也能攻击水面部队，但效果略差），也能破坏敌军城防。轰炸机也会造成附带损害。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Savaran[COLOR_REVERT], the Persian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancer[COLOR_REVERT], requires [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Generalship[COLOR_REVERT] instead of [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Feudalism[COLOR_REVERT], has two less strength points and doesn't have a combat penalty when attacking cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]萨瓦兰[COLOR_REVERT]，波斯人取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]柳叶刀[COLOR_REVERT]，需要 [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]将军[COLOR_REVERT]，而不是 [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]封建主义[COLOR_REVERT]，有两个较少的力量点和没有战斗惩罚时攻击城市。

TEXT.English: Heavy Spearman
TEXT.Chinese: 重矛兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lancers[COLOR_REVERT] are immune to first strikes, don't receive defensive bonuses, have a combat penalty in cities and have a flank attack against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trebuchet[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骑兵[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]对第一次攻击免疫，不获得防御奖励，在城市有战斗惩罚，并且对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弹射器[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]投石机[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]单位有侧翼攻击。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rozwi Warrior[COLOR_REVERT], the Zimbabwean replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pikeman[COLOR_REVERT], is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunpowder Units[COLOR_REVERT] and doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resource.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]罗兹维矛兵[COLOR_REVERT]是津巴布韦替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]长矛[COLOR_REVERT]的产品，能够进入[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]丛林[COLOR_REVERT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]雨林[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT]，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火药单位[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗加成，并且不需要[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]资源。

TEXT.English: Trained when a Great General is born. Cities start with an Armoury.
TEXT.Chinese: 一个伟大的将军是天生的。城市始于军械库。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hwacha[COLOR_REVERT], the Korean replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT], has three extra strength points and has an reduced attack bonus when attacking cities.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火厢车[COLOR_REVERT]为高丽特色单位，替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]投石车[COLOR_REVERT]，除了传统压制武器的威力，还拥有对肉搏单位的战斗加成。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Receives [ICON_GOLD] for Sinking Enemy Ships
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]因击沉敌舰而获得[ICON_GOLD]

TEXT.English: Islamic Imam
TEXT.Chinese: 穆斯林阿訇

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Jaguar[COLOR_REVERT], the Aztec replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], requires the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Alloys[COLOR_REVERT] technology, doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Bloomery[COLOR_REVERT] technology, is cheaper, doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resource, is able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Woodsman I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: 这是阿兹特克的特色肉搏单位（替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑士[COLOR_REVERT]），不需要拥有特殊资源，在[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]丛林[COLOR_REVERT]地形具有优势加成。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hussars[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, can withdraw from combat, have a combat bonus on open terrain, have a attack bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] units and have a flank attack against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trebuchet[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轻骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]不获得防御加成，可以退出战斗，在开阔地形上有战斗加成，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大炮[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大炮[COLOR_REVERT]单位有攻击加成，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弹射器[COLOR_REVERT]有侧翼攻击，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]投石机[COLOR_REVERT]，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轰炸[COLOR_REVERT]，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大炮[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大炮[COLOR_REVERT]单位。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Great Generals[COLOR_REVERT] can settle in a city as a [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Great Military Instructor[COLOR_REVERT] specialist, can construct the [COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]Armoury[COLOR_REVERT] building and can attach itself to a unit which gives 20 experience and the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lead by Warlord[COLOR_REVERT] promotion to the unit.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大军事家[COLOR_REVERT]能够与特定单位结合为一体，并为所在地块的其他单位提供一次性的作战经验奖励。

TEXT.English: Kobukson
TEXT.Chinese: 高丽龟船

TEXT.English: Eight Banner
TEXT.Chinese: 八旗军

TEXT.English: Savaran
TEXT.Chinese: 波斯骑兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Guided Missiles[COLOR_REVERT] are immune to interception, can destroy improvements, bomb city defenses and damage enemy units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]巡航导弹[COLOR_REVERT]是现代战争不可缺少的一员，这种武器可对在其射程之内的任何地块造成极大破坏。

TEXT.English: Satellite
TEXT.Chinese: 卫星

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Gunships[COLOR_REVERT] are able to enter [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Jungle[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Rainforest[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT], cannot capture enemy cities or units, don't receive defensive bonuses, ignore terrain movement costs, can withdraw from combat, have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Armored Units[COLOR_REVERT], have a flank attack against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Amphibious[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: 此种旋翼单位行动迅速，是装甲部队的天敌。你可以用它们迟滞敌军，但你仍需依靠地面部队占领城市。

TEXT.English: Rabbit
TEXT.Chinese: 野兔

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Transports[COLOR_REVERT] have four cargo spaces and can withdraw from combat.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]运输舰[COLOR_REVERT]能运载四个单位，并可以出入大洋。但是运输舰无法抵御飞机和现代战舰的攻击。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Karolin[COLOR_REVERT], the Swedish replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketman[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill I[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Marsh[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]卡罗林枪手[COLOR_REVERT]是瑞典人对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]滑膛枪手[COLOR_REVERT]的替代品，免费获得[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]钻取I[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]沼泽活动[COLOR_REVERT]升级活动。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artillery[COLOR_REVERT] cannot capture enemy cities or units, don't receive defensive bonuses, have a combat bonus when attacking cities, cause collateral damage, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and can bombard city defenses.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火炮[COLOR_REVERT]在攻击敌方城市时非常有效；它们可以轰击敌方城防，当战斗失败时也有一定几率可安全撤退。同时,和火炮也会对与目标处于同一位置的其他敌军造成附带损害。

TEXT.English: Qizilbash
TEXT.Chinese: 伊朗火枪兵

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arabia Camel Archer[COLOR_REVERT], the Arabian replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Camel Archer[COLOR_REVERT], is immune to first strikes, requires [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Camels[COLOR_REVERT] instead of [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Horse[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus in [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Desert[COLOR_REVERT] and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Desert Adaptation[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
