TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]阿拉伯骆驼射手[COLOR_REVERT], 阿拉伯的UU，替代 [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]骆驼骑射手[COLOR_REVERT], 免疫首发打击, 需要 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]骆驼资源[COLOR_REVERT] 而不是[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]马资源[COLOR_REVERT], 不需要 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁资源[COLOR_REVERT], 在 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]沙漠[COLOR_REVERT] 有战斗加成，自动晋升 [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]沙漠适应[COLOR_REVERT] .

TEXT.English: Bombard
TEXT.Chinese: 射石炮

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]War Chariot[COLOR_REVERT], the Egyptian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Chariot[COLOR_REVERT], has an additional strength point, is immune to first strikes and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Desert Adaptation[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战车[COLOR_REVERT]，埃及替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战车[COLOR_REVERT]，有一个额外的力量点，对第一次攻击免疫，并以[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]沙漠适应[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: Companion
TEXT.Chinese: 希腊骑兵

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Numidian Cavalry[COLOR_REVERT], the Phoenician replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horseman[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't have a combat penalty when attacking cities, has a combat bonus against [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT] and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Disengage I[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Desert Adaptation[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: 努米迪亚骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]，腓尼基人代替[COLOR_REVERT]骑兵，攻击城市时没有战斗惩罚，对[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]近战单位[COLOR_REVERT]有战斗奖励，并从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]脱离I[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]沙漠适应[COLOR_REVERT]升级开始。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]SAM Infantry[COLOR_REVERT] can intercept aircraft and have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Helicopter Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 这种火器近战部队装备有地对空导弹，这使他们在同飞行器和直升机作战时获得加成。可以将它们与易受空中打击的其他部队部署在一起。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Workers[COLOR_REVERT] can build [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roads[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Railroads[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Farms[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mines[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Workshops[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lumbermills[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Windmills[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Watermills[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Plantations[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Quarries[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pastures[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Camps[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wells[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wineries[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cottages[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forts[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forest Preserves[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 使用[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工人[COLOR_REVERT]在城市周围改造地块，并修建道路方便贸易的开展。

TEXT.English: Tercio
TEXT.Chinese: 西班牙火枪手

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Llanero[COLOR_REVERT], the Colombian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hussar[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require the [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Biology[COLOR_REVERT] technology, has a combat bonus against the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Musketeer[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT] units and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mobility[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: 哥伦比亚替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轻骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]利亚内罗[COLOR_REVERT]，不需要 [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]生物[COLOR_REVERT]技术，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火枪手[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]步枪兵[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]单位有战斗奖励，并且从[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]移动升级开始。

TEXT.English: Iron Helmet
TEXT.Chinese: 铁盔

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bhikkus[COLOR_REVERT] ([COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Buddhist Missionaries[COLOR_REVERT]) can spread [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Buddhism[COLOR_REVERT] in friendly cities (or rival cities with whom you have [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Open Borders[COLOR_REVERT]).
TEXT.Chinese: 使用此传教单位传播[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]佛教[COLOR_REVERT]到友好城市（或对手的城市，如果双方[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]开放边界[COLOR_REVERT]）。如果拥有[COLOR_BUILDING_TEXT]大菩提寺[COLOR_REVERT]将可增加收入。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can build [LINK=literal]Slave Plantation[\LINK]
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]可以建立[LINK=literal]奴隶种植园[\LINK]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Steamships[COLOR_REVERT] have three cargo spaces and can withdraw from combat.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轮船[COLOR_REVERT]有三个货舱，可以退出战斗。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Longbowmen[COLOR_REVERT] have one first strike, can withdraw from combat, cause collateral damage and have an attack bonus in hills, forests and rainforests[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]hills[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]forests[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]rainforests[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 这种强大的投射部队在防御城市和丘陵时可获得一定防御加成。训练它们来取代你过时的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弓箭手[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]马里突击手[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: Mounted Brave
TEXT.Chinese: 印第安骑兵

TEXT.English: Royal Mamluk
TEXT.Chinese: 皇家马穆鲁克

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Huluganni[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in Asia Minor from 2000 to 800 BC.
TEXT.Chinese: 赫梯战车[COLOR_return]是一个野蛮人单位，在公元前2000年到公元前800年在小亚细亚繁殖。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pikemen[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 此种肉搏单位对骑乘单位具有特殊优势加成。

TEXT.English: Artisan
TEXT.Chinese: 工匠

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Labourers[COLOR_REVERT] are improved [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Workers[COLOR_REVERT]. They can build [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Roads[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Railroads[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Farms[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Mines[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Workshops[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Lumbermills[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Windmills[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Watermills[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Plantations[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Quarries[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Pastures[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Camps[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wells[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Wineries[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cottages[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forts[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forest Preserves[COLOR_REVERT], but at a faster rate.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工人[COLOR_REVERT]得到改进[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工人[COLOR_REVERT]。他们可以建造[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]道路[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁路[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]农场[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]矿山[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]车间[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]伐木场[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]风车[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]水厂[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]种植园[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]采石场[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]牧场[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]营地[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]水井[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]酒厂[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]村舍[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Forts[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]森林保留[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]，但速度更快。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Companion[COLOR_REVERT], the Greek replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horseman[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't have a combat penalty when attacking cities and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]March[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Blitz[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]希腊骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]，[COLOR U TEXT]骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]的希腊替代品，在攻击城市时没有战斗惩罚，并以[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]三月[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]闪电战[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Farari[COLOR_REVERT] is a barbarian unit that spawns in the Sahara from 450 to 1700 AD.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]法拉利[COLOR_REVERT]是一个野蛮人单位，在公元450年至1700年的撒哈拉沙漠中繁殖。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Artisan[COLOR_REVERT], the Teotihuacano replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Worker[COLOR_REVERT], can be stationed in a city to provide it with two culture points per turn.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工匠[COLOR_REVERT]是特奥蒂瓦卡诺文明[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]工人[COLOR_REVERT]的替代，可以驻扎在一个城市，为其提供每回合两个文化点。

TEXT.English: Jewish Rabbi
TEXT.Chinese: 犹太教拉比

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Battleships[COLOR_REVERT] can bombard city defenses and causes collateral damage.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战列舰[COLOR_REVERT]是最强的水面舰艇。战列舰能击沉大多数舰只（但对潜艇和空袭却显得无能为力）。类似的，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]战列舰[COLOR_REVERT]的攻击也会对目标同一位置的其他单位造成附带损害。战列舰也能轰击城防。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Hoplite[COLOR_REVERT], the Greek replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Spearman[COLOR_REVERT], has one additional strength point and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Cover[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Shock[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]希腊重装步兵[COLOR_REVERT]是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]枪兵[COLOR_REVERT]的希腊替代品，它有一个额外的强度点，从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]封面[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]休克[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Howitzers[COLOR_REVERT] cannot capture enemy cities or units, don't receive defensive bonuses, have a combat bonus when attacking cities, cause collateral damage, are immune to collateral damage from [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Siege Weapons[COLOR_REVERT] and can bombard city defenses.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]榴弹炮[COLOR_REVERT]不能捕获敌人的城市或单位，不能获得防御奖励，攻击城市时有战斗奖励，造成附带伤害，对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]攻城武器[COLOR_REVERT]的附带伤害免疫，并且可以轰炸城市防御。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Wolves[COLOR_REVERT] are Barbarian units that spawn in Siberia from 3000 to 850 BC.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]狼[COLOR_REVERT]是公元前3000年至850年在西伯利亚繁殖的野蛮单位。

TEXT.English: Heavy Galley
TEXT.Chinese: 重型桨帆船

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Firelancer[COLOR_REVERT], the Chinese replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arquebusier[COLOR_REVERT], requires [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Gunpowder[COLOR_REVERT] instead of [COLOR_TECH_TEXT]Firearms[COLOR_REVERT], has one less strength point and causes collateral damage.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火枪手[COLOR_REVERT]，中国人取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火枪手[COLOR_REVERT]，需要[COLOR U TECH U TEXT]火药[COLOR_REVERT]而不是[COLOR U TECH U TEXT]枪械[COLOR_REVERT]，力量点减少一点，造成附带伤害。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archers[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, can withdraw from combat and have a combat bonus on open terrain.
TEXT.Chinese: 这种骑乘单位在早期是十分强大的，尤其擅长对抗装备投石机的敌军部队。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Dragoons[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses and are basic [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mounted Units[COLOR_REVERT] in the Industrial Era.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]龙骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]不会获得防御奖励，是工业时代基本的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]装备单位[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Howitzer
TEXT.Chinese: 榴弹炮

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cuirassiers[COLOR_REVERT] don't receive defensive bonuses, are immune to first strikes, have a combat penalty in cities and can withdraw from combat.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]胸甲骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]标志着骑乘单位从冷兵器时代发展到火器时代，是[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]近代骑兵[COLOR_REVERT]出现之前最强大的陆军兵种。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Waka[COLOR_REVERT], the Polynesian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galley[COLOR_REVERT], has two additional movement points, is cheaper, has one less cargo space and can create [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Fishing Boats[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]瓦卡[COLOR_REVERT]，波利尼西亚取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]大帆船[COLOR_REVERT]，有两个额外的移动点，更便宜，有一个较少的货舱，可以创造[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]渔船[COLOR_REVERT]。

TEXT.English: Mobile Guard
TEXT.Chinese: 阿拉伯骑兵

TEXT.English: Labourer
TEXT.Chinese: 劳动者

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mehal Sefari[COLOR_REVERT], the Ethiopian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Rifleman[COLOR_REVERT], begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill I[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill II[COLOR_REVERT] promotions.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Mehal Sefari[COLOR_REVERT]，埃塞俄比亚取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]步枪兵[COLOR_REVERT]，从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill I[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Drill II[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Shotelai[COLOR_REVERT], the Ethiopian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsman[COLOR_REVERT], doesn't require the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Iron[COLOR_REVERT] resource and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Guerilla I[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: 埃塞俄比亚人取代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]剑客[COLOR_REVERT]的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Shotelai[COLOR_REVERT]不需要[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]铁[COLOR_REVERT]资源，而是从[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]游击队I[COLOR_REVERT]提升。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Janissary[COLOR_REVERT], the Turkish replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Arquebusier[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Archery Units[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Heavy Cavalry Units[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 苏丹亲兵是奥斯曼人特有的早期火器单位（替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]火枪手[COLOR_REVERT]），该单位非常适宜对抗肉搏、投射类以及骑乘类单位。

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Lanternas[COLOR_REVERT], the Italian replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleass[COLOR_REVERT], is cheaper, has two additional strength points and one additional movement point.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]意大利战船[COLOR_REVERT]，意大利语替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Galleass[COLOR_REVERT]，更便宜，有两个额外的力量点和一个额外的移动点。

TEXT.English: Musketeer
TEXT.Chinese: 火枪手

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pistoliers[COLOR_REVERT] are immune to first strikes, don't receive defensive bonuses, can withdraw from combat, have a combat bonus on open terrain and have a flank attack against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Catapult[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Trebuchet[COLOR_REVERT], [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Bombard[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Cannon[COLOR_REVERT] units.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]手枪手[COLOR_REVERT]对第一次攻击免疫，不接受防御加成，可以退出战斗，在开阔地形上有战斗加成，并且对[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]弹射器[COLOR_REVERT]，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]投石机[COLOR_REVERT]，[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]轰炸[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]加农炮[COLOR_REVERT]单位。

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Can perform a Great Mission
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]可以完成一个伟大的任务

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Oghuz[COLOR_REVERT], the Turkic replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Horse Archer[COLOR_REVERT], starts with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]March[COLOR_REVERT] promotion, have hidden nationality and can attack units of other civilizations without declaring war.
TEXT.Chinese: 土库曼骑兵取代了马弓箭手奥古兹[COLOR_REVERT]，开始于3月[COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]的晋升，拥有隐藏的国籍，可以攻击其他文明的单位而不宣战。

TEXT.English: Rural
TEXT.Chinese: 墨西哥骑兵

TEXT.English: Zero
TEXT.Chinese: 日本战机

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Landsknecht[COLOR_REVERT], the German replacement for the the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Pikeman[COLOR_REVERT], has a combat bonus against [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT] and begins with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Leadership[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: 此种强力肉搏兵种是神圣罗马的特色单位，替代[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]长枪兵[COLOR_REVERT]，对骑乘单位和肉搏单位均有战斗加成。

TEXT.English: Farari
TEXT.Chinese: 法拉里骑兵

TEXT.English: Guard
TEXT.Chinese: 法国龙骑兵

TEXT.English: The [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Man-of-War[COLOR_REVERT], the English replacement for the [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Ship of the Line[COLOR_REVERT], has three additional strength points, one additional movement point and does collateral damage to one more unit.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]英国战船[COLOR_REVERT]，英国替换的[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]船，有三个额外的力量点，一个额外的移动点，并对一个以上的单位造成附带伤害。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Main Battle Tanks[COLOR_REVERT] have one first strike, don't receive defensive bonuses and begin with the [COLOR_HIGHLIGHT_TEXT]Blitz[COLOR_REVERT] promotion.
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]主战坦克[COLOR_REVERT]有一次第一次攻击，不获得防御奖励，从[COLOR_REVERT]闪电战[COLOR_REVERT]升级开始。

TEXT.English: Kommando
TEXT.Chinese: 科曼多骑兵

TEXT.English: Yan Lifida
TEXT.Chinese: 尼日利亚骑兵

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Swordsmen[COLOR_REVERT] have a combat bonus when attacking cities.
TEXT.Chinese: 这是强大的早期肉搏单位，适合进攻城市。

TEXT.English: [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Crossbowmen[COLOR_REVERT] have one first strike, have a defense bonus in cities and hills and have a combat bonus against [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Melee Units[COLOR_REVERT] and [COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]Light Cavalry Units[COLOR_REVERT].
TEXT.Chinese: 这是一种强大的投射部队，在对抗肉搏部队时获有加成。将这些部队与[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]长枪兵[COLOR_REVERT]和[COLOR_UNIT_TEXT]钉锤手[COLOR_REVERT]混编时可获得很强的综合战力。

TEXT.English: Torpedo Boat
TEXT.Chinese: 鱼雷艇

TEXT.English: Kyundaw
TEXT.Chinese: 缅甸重矛兵

TEXT.English: Orthodox Missionary
TEXT.Chinese: 东正教传教士

TEXT.English: [ICON_BULLET]Create Production and Gold when Removing Jungles, Rainforest and Forests
TEXT.Chinese: [ICON_BULLET]移除丛林、雨林和森林时创造产量和黄金
